nodes.text: The mother of Maediyu, a soldier in the Rebel Alliance's 61st Mobile Infantry, was a female individual. In 3 ABY, after falling victim to the Galactic Empire's bioweapons on the agricultural planet Nakadia, Maediyu mistook First Sergeant Hazram Namir for her mother while suffering from the chemicals, which eventually killed her.
Maediyu's mother was mentioned in the 2015 novel Battlefront: Twilight Company, written by Alexander Freed.
